# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ANSYS_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(ANSYS)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ANSYSPluginInfo.C
ANSYSCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
ANSYSPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ANSYSMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtANSYSFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ANSYSEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtANSYSFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IANSYSDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IANSYSDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IANSYSDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MANSYSDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MANSYSDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MANSYSDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MANSYSDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EANSYSDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EANSYSDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EANSYSDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EANSYSDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EANSYSDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EANSYSDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EANSYSDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EANSYSDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ANSYS ${INSTALLTARGETS})
